name: Fuzzimutt Creations
body:
### Hi there!
Welcome to FuzziMutt Creations, the home of plush, art, and crafts by artist Dia P. Hill; aka "FuzziMutt."
This is so far a placeholder for an awesome site to come, but please feel free to visit and follow us on any of the sites below!

!(http://i.stack.imgur.com/4iiKJ.png)  !(http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/sicons/basic-round-social/512/twitter-icon.png) !(https://d3rnbxvnd0hlox.cloudfront.net/images/channels/64/icons/large.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
